title: Mariner's Breastplate
contents: text | While wearing this armor, you have a swimming speed equal to your walking speed. In addition, whenever you start your turn underwater with 0 hit points, the armor causes you to rise 60 feet toward the surface. The armor is decorated with fish and shell motifs.
bullet | You gain a +1 bonus to AC while you wear this armor.
bullet | You have resistance to acid damage.
picture | (E) command spell? immune to acid, frighten

title: Cloak of Arachnida
contents: text | This fine garment is made of black silk interwoven with faint silvery threads. While wearing it, you gain the following benefits:
bullet | You have resistance to poison damage.
bullet | You can't be caught in webs of any sort and can move through webs as if they were difficult terrain.

bullet | You can use an action to cast the web spell (save DC 15). The web created by the spell fills twice its normal area. Once used, this property of the cloak can't be used again until the next dawn.
picture | (A) You have a climbing speed equal to your walking speed.
picture | (A) You can move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and upside down along ceilings, while leaving your hands free.

title: Pearl of Power
contents: text | While this pearl is on your person, you can use an action to speak its command word and regain one expended spell slot. If the expended slot was of 4th level or higher, the new slot is 3rd level. Once you use the pearl, it can't be used again until the next dawn.
bullet | Advanced portent: You can reroll one of your prediction, but most take the new roll.
